title: [Large-Scale] Social Problem-Solving Skill Enhancement Course Through Virtual Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic awareness of social issues and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with advanced expertise in community issues/solutions. Parallel self-directed learning using personal devices and small-group collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more community problem analysis frameworks through virtual case-based learning.
Learners can design problem-solving strategies with peers using digital collaboration tools in a blended environment.
Learners can improve their critical thinking skills by over 20% through formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
